function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain signal calibration for Covid-19 marker in WBE monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate monitoring of Covid-19 spread, leading to ineffective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Target key endogenous biomarkers for more accurate monitoring, conduct extensive research for signal calibration","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) technology, advanced analytical methods for detection","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limitations of qualitative approach in WBE monitoring","Impact":"Inability to accurately determine infection levels and potential spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Develop and validate more sensitive analytical methods for detection, conduct extensive research on qualitative approach","Technologies":"rt-PCR, antigen detection methods, advanced analytical methods","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of intercommunity comparison in semi-quantitative approach of WBE monitoring","Impact":"Inability to assess spread of infection across communities, limiting coordinated disease control efforts","Mitigation":"Develop methods for intercommunity comparison, validate semi-quantitative approach with extensive research","Technologies":"Advanced analytical methods, data analysis tools","People":"Community members, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
